arcade.env.comp

Interface Component

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    public interface Component
extends sim.engine.Steppable
    A Component object is a steppable that interacts with the environment.

    Component objects can be used for:

    • changing Lattice arrays such as through diffusion or introduction of a drug
    • physical entities within the environment such as capillary beds or matric scaffolding
    Component objects are the analog to Helper for steppables that affect the environment.
